instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up and then tap Settings > Sound & notification . Tap Advanced . Tap Phone ringtone . Or in dual SIM models, tap Slot 1 ringtone or Slot 2 ringtone . Select a ringtone from the list. If you want to add a ringtone, tap Add icon and then choose where you want to add the ringtone from. When you're done selecting your ringtone, tap Apply .
